content.rendered:
[vc_row class_row=”page–hasTop”][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true” el_class=”mb-2″][vc_column_inner]

give us a nudge

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner is_container=”true” class_row=”align-items-end”][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-0 order-1″ width=”1/3″ desktop_width=”2″ tablet_width=”2″ phone_width=”6″]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”order-sm-1 order-0 mb-sm-0 mb-4″ width=”1/3″ desktop_offset=”1″ desktop_width=”6″ tablet_width=”8″ phone_width=”12″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__medium text-uppercase mp-0 js-animation–lines text-center pl-xl-5 pr-xl-5″ offset_animation=”data-offset=“.15“” offset_onscreen_animation=”.75″]We’d love to hear what you’re working on and figure out where we fit in. Get in touch with us to discuss your project, request a quote or even just to pick our brains. We’re always open to making new connections[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”ml-lg-auto order-sm-2 order-1″ width=”1/3″ desktop_width=”auto” tablet_width=”2″ phone_width=”6″][vc_column_text el_class=”desc__still text-lg-left text-right mp-0 js-animation–lines” offset_onscreen_animation=”.9″ offset_animation=”data-offset=“.3“”]Bison®
contact /17-21[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]

We don’t bite.

/info

Address Balal Road, San Gwann
Get direction
Number +356 99025480
Email bison@bison-studio.com
Get direction
Social
  • Instagram
  • Facebook
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true”][vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[vc_row_inner is_container=”true” class_row=”justify-content-center”][vc_column_inner phone_width=”auto”] Start a project [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
